Solar power: Install solar panels to generate electricity from the sun. This can be used to power small appliances, charge phones, and even provide light.
Wind power: Install a wind turbine to generate electricity from the wind. This can be used to power small appliances and even provide light.
Water power: Use water to generate electricity by installing a hydroelectric turbine. This can be used to power small appliances and even provide light.
Fire power: Use fire to generate electricity by installing a fire turbine. This can be used to power small appliances and even provide light.
Biomass power: Use organic matter to generate electricity by installing a biomass turbine. This can be used to power small appliances and even provide light.
